reference.title: chrow
reference.shortdesc: The <chrow> element is a container inside the <choicetable> element. The <chrow> element contains both a <choption> and <chdesc> element as a pair.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.pre: <step><cmd>Then this</cmd> <substeps> <substep importance="optional"><cmd>which is done by doing this</cmd></substep> <substep importance="required"><cmd>and then this.</cmd></substep> </substeps> <choicetable> <chhead> <choptionhd>Do something</choptionhd> <chdeschd>Or Else this</chdeschd> </chhead> <chrow><choption>Do this</choption> <chdesc>and this will happen</chdesc></chrow> <chrow><choption>Do that</choption> <chdesc>and that will happen</chdesc></chrow> </choicetable> </step>
